info.description: For creating and managing Aladdin Studio notification subscriptions.
info.title: Studio Notification Subscription

post.description: Creates a Studio subscription for a user and Studio notification event

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

rpcStatus.description:
The `Status` type defines a logical error model that is suitable for
different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs. It is
used by [gRPC](https://github.com/grpc). Each `Status` message contains
three pieces of data: error code, error message, and error details.

You can find out more about this error model and how to work with it in the
[API Design Guide](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/errors).

code.description: The status code, which should be an enum value of [google.rpc.Code][google.rpc.Code].

message.description:
A developer-facing error message, which should be in English. Any
user-facing error message should be localized and sent in the
[google.rpc.Status.details][google.rpc.Status.details] field, or localized by the client.

details.description:
A list of messages that carry the error details.  There is a common set of
message types for APIs to use.

requests.title: A maximum of 100 subscriptions can be created at the same time

results.description: The list of results of the operation in case of success.

error.description: The error result of the operation in case of failure or cancellation.

output.description: The normal response of the operation in case of success.

v1FilterStudioSubscriptionsRequest.description: The request body of the filter studio subscriptions call.

query.description: The query used to filter against studio subscriptions.

pageToken.description: The starting point of a query result.

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of studio notifications to be returned per page of results. The maximum allowed page size is 1000.

Default is 100 if empty or a number < 1 is specified.

v1FilterStudioSubscriptionsResponse.description: The response for filter studio subscriptions method.

studioSubscriptions.description: The studio subscription entities that match the specified respective filter request.

nextPageToken.description: A token to retrieve the next page of results.

v1RangeFilter.title: Range Filter for filter requests across apis

v1StudioEntityType.description:
- STUDIO_ENTITY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified
 - STUDIO_ENTITY_TYPE_USER: User
 - STUDIO_ENTITY_TYPE_PROJECT: Project
 - STUDIO_ENTITY_TYPE_SPACE: Space
v1StudioEntityType.title: StudioEntityType is the entity type of the notification receiver

v1StudioNotificationAction.description:
- STUDIO_NOTIFICATION_ACTION_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified
 - STUDIO_NOTIFICATION_ACTION_SMTP: Email notification
 - STUDIO_NOTIFICATION_ACTION_PUSH: Studio UI push notification
v1StudioNotificationAction.title: StudioNotificationAction describes the method in which the user will receive the notification

v1StudioNotificationEvent.title: StudioNotificationEvent contains the information about the event that triggers a Studio notification

studioNotificationEventType.title: studio_notification_event_type is the type of event that triggered the notification e.g. NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PROJECT

eventName.title: name is the name of the event specific to the type of notification e.g. project_user_added

v1StudioNotificationEventType.description:
- STUDIO_NOTIFICATION_EVENT_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified
 - STUDIO_NOTIFICATION_EVENT_TYPE_ACM: Aladdin Credit Management
 - STUDIO_NOTIFICATION_EVENT_TYPE_COMPUTE: Studio Compute
 - STUDIO_NOTIFICATION_EVENT_TYPE_API: API Applications
 - STUDIO_NOTIFICATION_EVENT_TYPE_SPACE: Studio Space
 - STUDIO_NOTIFICATION_EVENT_TYPE_PROJECT: Studio Project
v1StudioNotificationEventType.title: StudioNotificationEventType is the type of Studio notification

studioEntityType.title: studio_entity_type is the entity type of the notification receiver

studioEntityName.title: studio_entity_name is the name of the targeted notification receiver

v1StudioSubscription.title: StudioSubscription describes a subscription to a Studio notification

id.title: id is the unique identifier of a subscription

user.title: user is the user that is subscribed to a notification

studioNotificationEvent.title: studio_notification_event is the type of notification the user is subscribed to

studioNotificationScope.title: studio_notification_scope is the scope of who this notification will be sent to matched by the subscription

studioNotificationAction.title: action is the type of method the user will receive the notification

email.title: email is the email address of the user that has this subscription

creationDateTime.title: creation_date_time is the time the subscription was created

v1StudioSubscriptionsQuery.description: The query required to perform a filter studio subscription call.

studioEntityType.title: Type of entity we are filtering subscription on

studioEntityName.title: Name of entity we are filtering subscription on

studioNotificationEventType.title: Type of event we are filtering subscription on

studioNotificationEventName.title: Name of the event we are filtering subscription on

userId.title: user id of the studio subscription

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
scopes.platform.studio.studio_notification.v1.S: This grants access to all endpoints in the platform.studio.studio_notification.v1.StudioSubscription API

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
scopes.platform.studio.studio_notification.v1.S: This grants access to all endpoints in the platform.studio.studio_notification.v1.StudioSubscription API
